Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
* Central location - opposite Q1
* 24 rooms/ 61 beds
* 698sqm* freehold land
* Vacant possession going concern
* Fully equipped kitchen facilities
* Lounge and Bar facilities available
* Future development potential

For Sale by Expressions of Interest closing Thursday 17th October 2013 at 12.00pm

Under instructions from Grant Sparks, Michael Owen & Stephen Parbery as Receivers & Managers appointed.

- Great opportunity available for bar and restaurant operators, strategically located in the central area of Surfers Paradise, surrounded by retail stores, restaurants and bars.

Trade Area Analysis:
- Surfers Paradise is known as the tourist hub of the Gold Coast with approximately 10 million * overnight visitors per annum
- Within close proximity to Surfers Paradise main light rail station, recording 2.3 million * passengers per annum
- Projected influx of 700,000 visitors * during the 2018 Gold Coast Commonwealth Games
- Gold Coast is evolving as a large and international city, currently experiencing a construction boom with strong employment and retail spend

Key Property Details:
+ 252 sq * internal area
+ 42.5 sqm * of exclusive alfresco area on foot path
+ 30 sqm * outside lounge area
+ 42 sqm * of storage area
+ Liquor licence to 3AM calling for strong liquor sales


approx *
inquire for details  **

Contact exclusive agents for further details

* Located in the heart of Australia's premier leisure destination

* 357 room award-winning 4 star holiday resort with extensive family facilities and strong income
  stream - consistently trading above 83% occupancy

* Offered with Vacant Possession

* 2009 revenue: $19.9M*

* The 2.49 ha* site covers an entire city block with four street frontages

* DA Approved Stage 1 - a 30 level, 232 apartment tower - can commence immediately without
  interference to the resort operation

* Entire site is earmarked for 4 Apartment Towers - a projected yield of circa 2,500 bedrooms

Expressions of Interest close: Wednesday 26th May 2010 at 4:00pm.

For further information or to arrange an inspection, please call:

Mark Witheriff - CB Richard Ellis | 0439 038 100 | mark.witheriff@cbre.com.au
Andrew Jackson - CB Richard Ellis | 0405 355 972 | andrew.jackson@cbre.com.au
